website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to beat this spearfishing wetsuit’s full body protection from ultraviolet rays, the sting of oceanic pests, and the biting chill of the ocean, and with so many styles available, you’ll look great too.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, small to XXXL
Available in several colors and styles
cons: The prices for specific color and size options vary wildly, and some options may not be readily available

customer_reviews.title: Great item, glad to have the hood, difficult to take off
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for snorkling, especially if water is cold. Fit super u der shorty wet suit. Only downside is it is difficult to get off over the first shoulder. Dries fast, but if you have to pull it up again wet—really hard to get back on over the shoulders and into the arms. Pluses outweigh difficulty in getting off or putting back on if damp. So glad we had them in the Galapagos
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Kopacka

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6”1’, 180lbs. I bought XXL. Fits well, snug but not overly tight. Thin material similar to Lycra like a swim shirt or running shirt. Quality seems good. I got it for snorkeling in Florida during the winter where it’s a little cold if just wearing swim trunks. My daughter says I look like a seal but I’m not trying to win beauty pageant just be warm. I may not use the hood (just tuck it in behind my neck).
customer_reviews.author: FL-ESQ

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: I just got the suit and it fits well and seems well made. I got it to replace a rash guard that I've had a few years. In terms of size I got an XXL. I'm 6'1" and weigh 175. Obviously sizes run very small. It's nice it has a hood which was important as I prefer to stay protected from the sun. Used it on 14 dives recently. Does exactly what I want which is to protect me from the sun between dives after I peel down my wetsuit. No problem with seams or zippers or material.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kay

customer_reviews.title: Attractive functional suit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8” tall 128 lbs and the size large fit just right. The meduim would have been too small. The combo of colors of material and stitching give the suit a versatile sporty look. While I was recently vacationing at the beach, it most definitely came in handy for blocking the intense rays of the Florida sun. Was great for swimming in the gulf and the wetness of the material actually kept me cool when walking and beach combing. Also like the draw string bag it comes with. Take time when putting it on dry preferably, and zip slowly half way up to all the way up as a turtleneck with the hood if so desired.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Happy snorkeller
customer_reviews.text: I wear it either under a hi-viz shirt or under a wetsuit when snorkeling. Great fit. I would normally order an XXL but took a risk because some reviewers said this runs small. It fits just fine, although I prefer to have a little help to get it off my shoulders afterwards. It feels good and seems durable. Great sun and stinger protection.
customer_reviews.author: Dayyana

customer_reviews.title: Just want I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 ft 3in. Weigh 162 pounds. I normally wear a large because I wear 38D bra. But from the reviews I ordered XL. And it fits like a Large so this size is just right for me. Stretchy, soft, weird smell , so I washed b4 wearing it. Very comfy. I would recommend. Just order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kay young

customer_reviews.title: Great Skin Suit
customer_reviews.text: i just got open water dive certified but i still get a little nervous underwater when i feel random things graze my body. I purchased this skin suit to dive in the Philippines/warm water climates. It was absolutely perfect. It also protected my skin from the sun at the surface or while snorkeling. Having the hood is also amazing. helps my mask not get tangled in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: l’atelier de spark

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The style and size of the rash guard are okay. However, the material is kinda thin and the bands attached to the waist broke on first use. I'm not sure how long the zipper and the foot bands would last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went diving for 8hrs in Egypt’s red sea and this suit prevented sunburn perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was able to free dive at reefs without the use of reef damaging sunscreen and this suit enabled me to have zero sunburn. It’s the way to go if you want to keep our oceans clean. The suit fit as expected and blocked the sun better than expected. 10/10 would buy again. I was not a fan of the color scheme but I knew that before I bought it. Hopefully they come out with more variety suits in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Right Tightness and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried it on and it fits very well, not too tight and also not loose at all. I felt that it is just right tightness so I can even swim with the suit on. It is warm as well. I am looking forward to wearing it for snorkeling and paddle boarding when I am on vacation. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN STONE

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect but short zipper
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.10 180LBs, L size fits me perfect. but the zipper doesn't go all the way down which I do not like, and here is why, I advise anyone before you wear it to use the bathroom because later if you need to use the bathroom you have to undress :-)...and if there is no bathroom you have to hide behind the bushes if any :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: great dive skin!
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortablle and great for snorkeling! and I like it very much ! cause the fabric is so comfortable and also in fashion! I can wear it wen esercise,and it makes me look thineer! (*^▽^*)
customer_reviews.author: Gou Xiaomeng

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as wet suit, not even close
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this it was advertised as a wet suit, which was very much not true lol so don't buy if that is the intention. It was more of a full body swimsuit. I have requested a return
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Follow sizing guide
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who snorkles and scubas locally in Florida. Thin suit compared to more professional name brand. Don't rely on for sun protection or use during winter months. This is a thin full suit good for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable buy size up if you dont want really tight
customer_reviews.text: Little small, definitely helps when u swim in jellyfish areas. Didnt get stung by larve, or jellies. Also used jellyfish repellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this full body suit for a recent snorkeling vaca in Indonesia. Worked out perfect for sun protection and keep the jelly fish from stinging. Loved that it had a hood.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese Head

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. It’s true to the size. Just make sure you get your measurements. Don’t go by size S, M or L. It comes with a nice carrying sacks. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Katsuhide Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price ! Helps protect from sun, rash and stingers. Looks good on. Adds very little warmth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a base for my Halloween costume. I can’t attest to how it functions in water, but I did wear it for a whole day. It was very comfortable and I didn’t feel any restrictions in my range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Hood is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: High quality, rises above other dive skins. The hood adds extra warmth. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: it fit me perfect. i liked it. i am 5 ft, 100 lbs, i ordered M size.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Feels more like a medium
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know it came with a hood, maybe I can cut it off. Found it a bit tight for a large, hoping it will stretch out a little !
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great suit.....order up on size !
customer_reviews.text: Love this , great product, but order up one size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Fits good I’m 5’9 about 180 lbs fits very good!
customer_reviews.author: Wing lam

customer_reviews.title: size up!
customer_reviews.text: husband satisfied with it. really nice! 2xl 178cm, 83kg good
customer_reviews.author: blueromance

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Good price, comfortable. good for swimming, surfing. this provides sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Joo Y. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he was not happy with it as he was very cold out of the water and the friction while in the water was very discomforting. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: BigRayDog8

customer_reviews.title: Sorta Disappointed :/
customer_reviews.text: So I got this thinking it was a wetsuit but I got this and I wasn’t that disappointed but I wasn’t what I expected this is definitely still a great product but i should of read into the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.8in and 160lb, size xl fits well. It is so far so good. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great value,  and awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I didn't know what to expect, when I called around to the local dive shops they wanted DOUBLE the price... Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feel are important.
customer_reviews.text: We will be testing testing the product soon, but so far it looks, feels and fits very good.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Slightly tight in the shoulders but other wis very good!
customer_reviews.author: John Hornak

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this to windsurf and swim in rivers and it's great! Very comfortable, keeps me from having to use tons of nasty sunscreen, it feels thick and good quality, and it's holding up well after 10 or 20 wears. :)
customer_reviews.author: Erik Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: My new rash guard
customer_reviews.text: I love my new rash guard. It fit perfectly. I was able to dive wearing it straight out of the box it was comfortable & stylish & my dive buddies could see me & keep track of me while diving. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase
customer_reviews.text: Has completely liberated me from fear of burning my sun sensitive skin. Looks great & feels great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rash Guard UPF 50+ UV Sunprotection for Men Women Full Body Diving Suit Breathable Sports Dive Skins for Snorkeling Swimming Kayaking
product_meta.description:
Please note: Our size is different from the US standard size, so please DO remember to lanch the picture of the SIZE CHARTto see our advice for you.

Have other diving wetsuit made you feel like you were in a straightjacket? Then you’ll love the freedom of movement and unequaled range of motion made possible by our wetsuit.


 

Glide-On & Glide-On Ease

 

While the skin fits like a glove, it features a full-length front zipper that’s ideal for quick changing. The material’s flexibility also helps. Best of all, the base layer’s smooth, seamless finish makes it easier to slip your wetsuit layer on top in seconds.

 

Superior Layered Protection

 

The full-body design perfectly complements your other underwater protective gear, optimizing performance in diving, snorkeling, swimming, surfing, and more. The base layer protects you from jellyfish, sea lice, and other deep-sea parasites.

 

Full UV Spectrum Protection

 

Underwater and above it, the complete body coverage provides you with a reliable defense against the sun's deadly rays. In colder conditions, the base layer adds additional warmth to keep your body temperature in performance range..

 

Peak Comfort & Perfect Fit

 

The suit's nylon (82%) and spandex (18%) material blend makes for a soft, stretchy feel that won't irritate your skin like other form-fitting suits. At the bottom, stirrups wrap your feet to ensure that the suit’s legs don't bunch up while you’re active.

Package: 

1x diving wetsuit 

1 x waterproof drawstring bag
feature_bullets: Lycra UV Protection Long Sleeves Sports Dive Skins for Running, Exercising, Snorkeling, Swimming, Spearfishing & Other Water Sports

【Full Body Coverage Design】 Full body cover wetsuit provides the best protection against sea lice, jellyfish, coral reef and other biological irritants. Perfect to wear in the ocean or any other water area. No more bruises and stings just wonderful diving experience.

【PREMIUM MATERIAL】:82% Nylon/ 18% Spandex .this swimsuit is extremely soft, breathable and lightweight. Excellent stretch and recovery maximize free body movement. It is idea for exercise in and out of the water.
【UV-RESISTANT:】Full-Body & Long-sleeve Design- Provides Reliable UV Protection to Minimize Sunburn. provides UPF50+ protection, it helps block 97.5% of the sun UV radiation
【EASY ON, EASY OFF】Long Front Zipper for Quick & UV protection fabric Changing; Stretchy stirrup wraps on wrist and foot keep wetsuit in place regardless of water resistance.
【FLEXIBLITY:】Perfect Form Fit Enhances Range of Motion & Supports Movement Underwater
